price: 18. Too ayró sinaamey cisab kee galtoh Yallí fooca sin maksan, isin qellissaanamak tu kaak maqellitta.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin tuʿ'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyatun
